settings.text: At EduDrift, we like our training classes to encompass using different energy systems for a maximum learning. Our specially curated activities and drills will use team based problem solving, critical thinking and tempo to blast both your inner and external thought processes, resulting in result driven sessions. Bring your A Game to these high energy sessions and really put your intelligence to the test!

Born in heart of Asia, the EduDrift combine its curriculums with elements of high- intensity learning, drill circuit training, and functional applications. The variation of our lessons keeps our students challenged, eager to grow and ready to have fun.
